sentence.Network_en: Some children have more finely trained perceptual skills than others.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些孩子比其他孩子具备更为训练有素的感知技能。

sentence.Network_en: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
sentence.Network_cn: 将橙皮擦出大约一茶匙的细末待用。

sentence.Network_en: This is a fast-moving but finely observed drama.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一部节奏紧凑但是观察入微的剧。
